item.description:
October's meeting will have a final update for our First Annual Wings and Wheels event (hopefully). This will be our last meeting before not only this event, but the Young Eagles event the following week.

We'll need a good group at this meeting to discuss the various jobs needed to pull this off in a safe fashion.

We also need to finalize our Christmas party details. We've talked about changing the location. We need to get this done in October too. Much happening here.

See you all soon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 October Meetup
